code: @Override public Object invoke(MethodInvocation invocation) throws Throwable {     synchronized (this) {         this.count++.     }     return super.invoke(invocation). }
@Override protected String getInvocationDescription(MethodInvocation invocation) {     return invocation + ". count=" + this.count. }

comment: /**  * Return the number of times this interceptor has been invoked.  */
code: /**  * Return the number of times this interceptor has been invoked.  */ public long getCount() {     return this.count. }

comment: /**  * Reset the invocation count to zero.  */
code: /**  * Reset the invocation count to zero.  */ public synchronized void resetCount() {     this.count = 0. }
